text.style: fill: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16.7px; font-weight: 700; white-space: pre;

ellipse.style: fill: rgba(216, 216, 216, 0); paint-order: fill; stroke-width: 3px; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-opacity: 0.65; stroke: rgb(0, 77, 132);
fill: rgba(216, 216, 216, 0); stroke: url(#pattern-0-0); stroke-width: 6px; stroke-opacity: 0.5;
